title: COKI Language Python Scripts
description:
This project contains scripts to detect the language of academic papers based on their titles and abstracts.

See the Github project for more details: https://github.com/The-Academic-Observatory/coki-language

creators.affiliation: Centre for Culture and Technology, Curtin University
